alert.note: Alert for Cass; Henry; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 25 at 7:58PM CST until December 27 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Creek at Blairstown affecting Henry, Cass and Johnson MO Counties. For the Big Creek...including Blairstown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Creek at Blairstown. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, The west bank of the creek begins to flood. At 23.0 feet, Flooding occurs at the west approach to the N Highway bridge located 0.2 miles west of Blairstown. Flooding also occurs across B Highway near Big Creek which is several miles northwest of Blairstown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 22.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 9.6 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/.
